Posts.Content: Jun 9, 2008 12:52PM Nice_Nichols wrote: Hi I had my surgery with reconstruction 3 weeks ago. Everything went well. My only complaint is that my right arm( mastectomy side)still doesn't have the same range of motion as my left arm. Is it a normal thing? I am doing some exercises given to me by my doctors. I am making some progress, but it is going kind of slow.  Is it what I should expect?
Posts.Title: How long will I need FT help at home after surgery? BustersMom Nice_Nichols
